data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Townsfolk 2 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains 22 tokens: Assorted merchants, workers and performers from a small village setting.

This token pack includes:

  • Baker
  • Bartender
  • Blacksmith
  • Dancer
  • Herald
  • Farmer
  • Merchant (male/female)
  • Miner
  • Musician
  • 4 Peasants
  • Porter
  • Shepherd
  • Shop Keeper
  • Sweeper
  • 2 Waitresses
  • Wood Gatherer

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
